words.arabic: ٱلۡحَمۡدُ al-hamdu All praises and thanks
نَسۡتَعِينُ nasta'inu we ask for help
أَنۡعَمۡتَ an'amta You have bestowed (Your) Favors
ٱلۡمَغۡضُوبِ al-maghdubi those who earned (Your) wrath
ٱلضَّآلِّينَ al-dalina (of) those who go astray
